scripts.dev: bun run css:dev & bun build src/frontend.tsx --outdir=dist/static/assets --public-path=/static/assets --splitting --format=esm --sourcemap --target=browser --watch
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r static dist/ && bun build src/frontend.tsx --outdir=dist/static/assets --public-path=/static/assets --splitting --format=esm --sourcemap --target=browser --minify && cp src/index.html dist/
scripts.preview: bun run build && bun run serve
